RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 5F Turf CR: 67. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (If necessary will be run SAME DISTANCE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FREEDOM'S ALLURE pressed the pace wresting a short lead on the turn dueling in upper stretch shaking clear near mid track late holding under a drive. LOVE MY CANDY brushed at the break moved up quickly on the turn angling six wide into upper stretch bidding gamely late. BETHPAGE brushed at the break would chase early racing evenly on the turn vying from the three path down the lane finishing well. SOPRISE ASTRAY hustled along came six wide in upper stretch angling in to the four path while rallying late. BLUEBERRY QUEEN pressed the pace from the inside through the turn dueling in upper stretch angling out a bit while weakening late. LUNA MIA sent hard would fade on the turn. KETO FRIENDLY pressed early wavering on the turn wilting in upper stretch. ALHAAN was checked hard off of heels near the three eighths pole. HIGHWAY ROBBERY was never involved. NIKITA was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Blueberry Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside lane, angled out a bit, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Freedom's Allure
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, led turn, shook clear late, held driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Highway Robbery
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Soprise Astray
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, 6 wide into lane, angled in, responded late

ENTRY.NAME: Keto Friendly
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, spent lane

ENTRY.NAME: Alhaan
ENTRY.COMMENT: checked hard 3/8 pole

ENTRY.NAME: Love My Candy
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed break, gained turn, angled 6 wide lane, bid gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Bethpage
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed break, dropped off turn, vied willingly three path lane

ENTRY.NAME: Luna Mia
ENTRY.OWNER: Ruiz Lilliam and MM Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent hard, faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Nikita
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 7F Turf CR: 73. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 4 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. (If necessary will be run SIX FURLONGS Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WHO U GONNA CALL advanced to the far turn surging there sweeping past from mid track late, injured pulling up was euthanized on track. CARISMATICA stalked the pace rallying into upper stretch bidding three deep ceding late to wide pressure. CAGUA slow early angled four wide in upper stretch responding to finish well. SHES THE NORTH stalked the pace angling to the rail on the far turn dueling inside of rivals in upper stretch coming up short. LADY LEAH set the pace being hooked and put in close between horses in upper stretch dropping off late. KITTEN BY THE SEA slow early came five wide down the lane finishing evenly. GOLDEN ACCOUNT slow early raced wide through the lane. GRAND VENUS was never involved. BEE WINGS was always outrun. AVENIDA MANANA raced evenly to the far turn then gave way into upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Leah
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, hooked between top lane, in close

ENTRY.NAME: Shes the North
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, angled rail turn, dueled lane, short

ENTRY.NAME: Carismatica
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, bid upper stretch, vied willingly late

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Venus
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Avenida Manana
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Cagua
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, angled 4 wide lane, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Account
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, wide lane

ENTRY.NAME: Bee Wings
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Who U Gonna Call
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, swept past mid track, euthanized after race

ENTRY.NAME: Kitten by the Sea
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, 5 wide lane, evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 1 3/8M Turf CR: 77. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 4 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility). (If necessary will be run ONE MILE AND ONE-QUARTER Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EVIE'S PRINCE gave a prompted middle move hooking foe on the far turn dueling abreast rival down the lane edging up gamely. TYRY TYRANNOSAURUS advanced on the backside engaging into the far turn dueling inside of rival down the lane ceding grudgingly at the end. JACKSON MAN raced evenly early rallying to lead on the backside being overtaken on the far turn chasing dueling rivals through the lane. B G LEE hustled out set the early pace then weakened on the far turn. FOGGY ALBION chased the pace through the far turn wearing out in upper stretch. BLACK BULL was never involved. SPY TOWN was always outrun. MACHO CASH outrun early would tire.

ENTRY.NAME: Spy Town
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Evie's Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, hooked far turn, edged up abreast gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Macho Cash
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early, tired,

ENTRY.NAME: Tyry Tyrannosaurus
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, dueled far turn, extended inside lane, gave all

ENTRY.NAME: Foggy Albion
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased through far turn, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Black Bull
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: B G Lee
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled out, set pace, ceded far turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Jackson Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, led backside, overtaken far turn, chased lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 9400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 4 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUEEN OF CLASS surged clear on the tur digging in past mid track in upper stretch turning away rail running foe late. GORILLA GIRL slow early rallied while cutting the corner to upper stretch bidding gamely along the rail. POLITICAL ASTRAY chased the pace through the turn racing from mid track down the lane finishing evenly. TEQUILA SUNSET slow early raced eight wide down the lane. NURSE KATIE away alertly set the early pace being passed on the turn weakening on the inside the final eighth. BALLYKEEN showed brief speed then faded on the turn. WICKED VALENTINE was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Tequila Sunset
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, 8 wide lane

ENTRY.NAME: Ballykeen
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief foot, faded on turn

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Valentine
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Political Astray
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, mid track lane, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Nurse Katie
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, overtaken turn, wore down inside

ENTRY.NAME: Gorilla Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, rallied cutting corner to lane, bid gamely along rail

ENTRY.NAME: Queen of Class
ENTRY.OWNER: Tijuana Racing Stables Tenenbaum Jeffrey and Bloom Jeffrey
ENTRY.COMMENT: surged clear turn, dug in past mid track, held up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 4, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 4 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LAUTREC taken back early saved ground to the far turn circling out into upper stretch dueling late edging up in the last strides. GAGE HAS A GRAY hustled out set the pace racing four wide through the far turn angling back inside in upper stretch being hooked from the outside late missing in the last jumps. ICONIC raced evenly to the half chasing on the far turn into upper stretch bidding the three path needing more. GOOD IDEA stalked the pace pressing from the inside in upper stretch weakening late along the rail. ONLYATTHESHOE tracked the pace pursuing through the turn weakening in the two path upper stretch. LEMON BLITZ was never involved. DYNAFORM gave way on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Lautrec
ENTRY.COMMENT: taken back, saved ground, circled out to lane, up last strides

ENTRY.NAME: Iconic
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, chased to lane, extended late, outbid rest

ENTRY.NAME: Dynaform
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave way on far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Good Idea
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, pressed into lane, weakened late on rail

ENTRY.NAME: Onlyattheshoe
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, pursued far turn, short inside

ENTRY.NAME: Gage Has a Gray
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled set pace 4 wide, angled in lane, hooked late, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Lemon Blitz
ENTRY.OWNER: MCM Racing LLC and Jansen Kenny
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 50. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $15,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WHY WINCHILL WHY slow early lagged through the turn coming five wide in upper stretch angling six wide in mid stretch running down a weary trio in the last yards. WATCHING SNOW FLY pressed the pace dueling through the turn digging in along the inside down the lane become leg weary when grabbed late. SWORD OF DAMOCLES chased early then pressed up on the turn dueling three deep down the lane becoming weary late ceding in the final yards. CASH IS MONEY pressed the pace dueling between horses through the turn into upper stretch weakening late. KID QUICK off slowly raced well back through the turn moving along the inside to upper stretch entering the picture at the front end tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Watching Snow Fly
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled on turn, dug in near rail lane, grabbed

ENTRY.NAME: Cash Is Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled between to lane, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Kid Quick
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back through the turn, entered contention inside late

ENTRY.NAME: Why Winchill Why
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged to lane, angled 6 wide, ran down trio late

ENTRY.NAME: Sword of Damocles
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, pressed three deep to lane, weary late, run down

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 94. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 21200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 4 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DAVID'S GEM cleared while racing four wide on the turn digging in from that path down the lane holding off rivals late. ENERGIZER bobbled slightly at the break, raced evenly outside through the turn angling to mid track in mid stretch pressing the issue late. RAD PAISLEY pressed on the inside ceding a clear lead to rival on the turn extending near the rail down the lane giving more late. INSIDE RISK raced evenly through the turn moving from the three path down the lane finding late response. TRAGICALLY QUEWICK slow early swung seven wide in upper stretch giving a mild rally there. BLACK CANDY slow early was in tight entering the stretch. BANKX TURBO pressed early then wavered on the turn giving way to upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Rad Paisley
ENTRY.OWNER: Eastham Richard and Brown Ronney W
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, ceded on turn, extended lane, vied late

ENTRY.NAME: Bankx Turbo
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early then wavered on the turn, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Inside Risk
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, three path lane, some late action

ENTRY.NAME: Black Candy
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, in close entering lane

ENTRY.NAME: Tragically Quewick
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, swung 7 wide lane, mild rally,

ENTRY.NAME: David's Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: cleared four wide turn, dug in lane, held driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Energizer
ENTRY.COMMENT: slight bobble break, evenly, vied 4-5 wide lane, pressed late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 4 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LONE LEADER rushed up four wide on the turn drawing even in upper stretch surging off late. SANTIAGO'S CAT away alertly set the pace being hooked on the turn dueling in upper stretch proving no match late. BRAVE HILARIO slow early lagged to upper stretch moving past tired ones there. VASY SAYS NYET pressed on the turn then weakened wide in upper stretch. OLD FORTY FIVE slow early played no factor. INGERSOLL pressed in bid on turn then gave way in upper stretch. SHAKEDOWN STREET was never involved. ROARING OCEAN gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Roaring Ocean
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave way on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Shakedown Street
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Santiago's Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, hooked turn, dueled lane, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Brave Hilario
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged to lane, moved past tired ones late

ENTRY.NAME: Ingersoll
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed on turn, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Vasy Says Nyet
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed on turn, weakened wide lane

ENTRY.NAME: Lone Leader
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide rush turn, drew even top lane, swept clear

ENTRY.NAME: Old Forty Five
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, no factor,
